Transcription for 792431

This is Emily in Llamberes Community Orchard.
The flow is always the same meandering across the space, but somehow new life appears, meandering
with rhythms within rhythms and the beauty of becoming and becoming, always meandering
and flowing, sunlight stretching to the sky, all directions spreading out, a network of
lines, the echo of footsteps on the earth, rhythms of the floating world within tiny
universes of love and fun, flows from flowers into people, all directions spreading out,
grasses growing and bending, undulating, always meandering of life.
